archimate:Requirement.name: R4.7.1 Have minimum possible number of controls
archimate:Requirement.documentation: U2 As a service owner/architect/platform owner/S&C product development I want the minimum number of controls possible to secure my service so that I don't have to do more work than is necessary U11 As Sales / Customer team I want the security model to be as simple as possible so it's easy for different people to consume and sell
